page.title: 01INTRODUCING OUR AREA
page.content: The land in our area is mostly green belt farmland.There are two main places of habitation.They are West Horndon and Little Warley.West Horndon is the main one. It is a small and peaceful village with good road and rail links, an industrial site, a park and a school. West Horndon was built in the last hundred years. Most of the people commute to London to work. On the other hand Little Warley is very old and was in the Domesday Book. It used to be a very large parish, but now there are no more than 5 houses. Most of the farms in the area are arable, but there is an abattoir. There is a sewage treatment works near Cranham so that means most of the area has mains drainage.
